name: Amaz3D
description:
Amaz3D is a first person game in 3D where you are stuck in a continuous cycle of mazes. As if that wasn't bad enough, if you don't find your way out quickly you'll start to lose your s a n i t y. Do you have what it takes to find your way out of every single one?

The game contains mutiple levels and all of them have an unique theme, like a desert, an 80's arcade game, a spooky florest and some of them have diferent win-game mechanics.
